T02D2128:173b-1: shr'i ae ka dza t'i bha ga w'a na sto tra /
T02D2128:173b-3: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa /
T02D2128:173b-4: bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2128:173b-5: dpa' bo gang zhig dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs rje thugs las sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2128:173b-6: mkha' ltar stong nyid ma ltar snying rje byams sogs tshad med las byung ba //
T02D2128:173b-7: padma nyid bus bde chen thob pa de bzhin mi ro khros pa yi //
T02D2128:173b-8: sna tshogs gdan stengs ye shes yig 'bru tam las yongs gyur thod pa dang //
T02D2128:173b-9: gri gug las grub h'um dang phyag mtshan 'gro ba'i don sgrub byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2128:174a-1: pa'i sku chen shin tu mi bzad rnams pa'i sku //
T02D2128:174a-2: 'gyings pag rab brtan gzi brjid dpal 'bar nyon mongs sgrib tshogs bsreg pa yi //
T02D2128:174a-3: ye shes me 'bar kun nas 'khyil ba'i 'od zer drag po dpung 'khrigs shing //
T02D2128:174a-4: sdig pa'i 'jom stabs h'um sgra dang bcas drag po'i gad mo can //
T02D2128:174a-5: phyogs bcur gar 'gyed mi thub gcig tu lha klu ha min dpung las rgyal //
T02D2128:174a-6: bde chen rgyal po gnyis med mchog dags rtag tu sdug bsngal rnams gnon rtsal //
T02D2128:174a-7: rgyal ba dgra rgyal sdug bsngal sdig 'joms dpa' bo dpa' chen la phyag 'tshal //
T02D2128:174a-8: gar dgu'i nyams ldan cung zad zhil zhi zhing khro dang khro zhing zhi //
T02D2128:174a-9: brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin stobs bcu'i dbang phyug mi dang lha las rnam par rgyal //
T02D2128:174a-10: sa gsum bdag po lha yi ltar gyur bde gshegs ma lus phrin las bsgrubs //
T02D2128:174a-11: mi g-yo mi 'gyur rtag tu brtan nas de bzhin nyid yul zab mo'i lam //
T02D2128:174a-12: sgyu ma mkha' 'gro nyid kyi thugs chud ma lus 'gro la rjes chags nas //
T02D2128:174a-13: slar yang 'dir zhugs skal ldan srog chags snying gi padmo kha phye nas //
T02D2128:174a-14: chags med chags bral gti mug las grol rab tu
T02D2128:174a-15: sdang ba rnam par bshig / kun du rtog spangs
T02D2128:174a-16: rab tu brtan gnas nges pa'i sar chud de nyid
T02D2128:174a-18: 'jigs byed skur bstan 'bar ba'i zhal gsum dkar dang
T02D2128:174a-19: dmar po sngon po'i mdog / spyan gsum thogs med
T02D2128:174a-20: smra smin ser g-yo ba'i ba sbu gyen du 'greng
T02D2128:174a-21: // dmar zlum spyan ba zlog 'od 'bar las byung bgegs tshogs bsreg pa'i me stag 'phro //
T02D2128:174a-22: ye shes rnon po'i mche ba gnyis gtsigs rngams shing bzhad pa'i zhal bgrad de //
T02D2128:174a-23: ha ha'i sgra sgrogs rta skad mtshor ba'i nga ro ku tso gad rgyangs 'byin //
T02D2128:174a-24: rtabs shing rab brgyal 'khrugs pa'i skad gsang ngar ngar rab ser 'o 'dod 'bod //
T02D2128:174a-25: gdug pa'i snying 'byin ma rungs snang 'tshod gcong sgra drag pos sa 'khrugs pa //
T02D2128:174a-26: rnam rgyal khro bo bdud dgra dpung 'dul phrin las lha dbang khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2128:174a-27: dmar ser 'gying ba'i ral pa gcig bcas bde gshegs gtso bo mi bskyod pas //
T02D2128:174b-0: @174b dregs pa'i dbu rgyan sangs rgyas rnam lnga'i mi thod 'jigs pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D2128:174b-1: autpal padmo mi yi rgyu zhags sbrul gdug khros pa'i rna rgyan can //
T02D2128:174b-2: de bzhin mi rus rin chen sbrul rgyan shin tu 'od 'bar 'jigs pa yi //
T02D2128:174b-3: rgyan rnams kyis brgyan sil sil sgra sgrogs kun nas bsdigs pa'i stabs kyis 'gyed pa'i tshul //
T02D2128:174b-4: phyag g-yas gri gug rdo rje ral gri de bzhin g-yon phyag mgo byed dang //
T02D2128:174b-5: autpal sdong mdzes dri bsung yid 'phrog phyogs bcur ngad ldan thugs kar 'dzin //
T02D2128:174b-6: dpal ldan gtso bo'i thub pa thub mchog mi pham gcig pu rnam par gnon//
T02D2128:174b-7: stang stabs pa grad pas phat ces brjod cing lha yi brtan po mi 'gul zhabs g-yas ni //
T02D2128:174b-8: dbugs bral gtso bo'i mgo bo nas brdzis g-yon pas gzhi bas pa'i rkang gnyis mnan //
T02D2128:174b-9: dpa' bo stag lpags spu rtse rab 'khrug du ba 'khyil 'dra gson pa ni //
T02D2128:174b-10: bshus pa'i yod la da ltar khrag 'jag glo bur stabs pas blangs nas su //
T02D2128:174b-11: khros pas bskyod 'dra mi yi skyob pa pha rol dpung rnams rnam bzlog cing //
T02D2128:174b-12: nyid kyi phyogs bsrung zhi rgyas dbang dra ma lus gsang sngags mngon par bsgrub //
T02D2128:174b-13: thog med rab ltar shin tu mi zlogs kun gyis mi thub thub dka' ba ;
T02D2128:174b-14: / nam mkha' kun khyab sa chen g-yos mdzad bde gshegs gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2128:174b-15: gang gi snying ni gtso bo chu skyes gsar 'khrungs phyogs kyis mtshon 'dra'i kha dog can //
T02D2128:174b-16: dkar ser dmar ljang rab tu gsal rgyal de dbus rab tu 'bar ba'i h'um //
T02D2128:174b-17: ye shes 'od 'phros 'gro ba'i sdig bsregs phyogs bcur mkhas khyab 'gengs pa yi //
T02D2128:174b-18: me lce'i phreng dkrigs mkha' la nyi ltar kun nas rtag tu lham me ba //
T02D2128:174b-19: de yi mthar ni ngag gi 'bru skar ma'i 'od can rnam pa'i bzhi //
T02D2128:174b-20: gsal bar bltas te mchod sogs sngon 'gro ji bzhin ji snyed tshogs bsgrubs nas //
T02D2128:174b-21: grub pa'i las ni rnam bzhi'i phrin las sa gsum lus can kun spro mdzad //
T02D2128:174b-22: de las slar 'ongs dkar bsil lus ngag yid kyi
T02D2128:174b-23: dri ma rnam bar dag / byas nas rdo rjes
T02D2128:174b-24: bla ma'i zhal blangs de nyid ye shes mnyam zhag
T02D2128:175a-1: sku gsung thugs dag de bzhin dag de'ang dri med gang yin gang //
T02D2128:175a-2: de nyid ye shes dang shes bral mtha' rnams las dben kun spyod pa //
T02D2128:175a-3: rnal 'byor chen po bde chen de ni bla ma'i drin thob khyod kyis bsgrubs //
T02D2128:175a-4: brtse ba'i rgyud bskyod byin rlabs me ni rnam mdun rnam gsum ye shes snying po lce mdud bcas //
T02D2128:175a-5: sa gsum na khyab bdag dang bdag med yod med dri ma ma lus las //
T02D2128:175a-6: rnam dben de ni rgyal pa'i sku zhes 'dren pa khyod kyis mthu ston cing //
T02D2128:175a-7: de rjes dri med sgyu 'dra mkha' 'dra rnam gsum rnam thar sgo spyod pa //
T02D2128:175a-8: so so rang rig snying gi dbus gnas bde gshegs snying po rtogs dka' ba //
T02D2128:175a-9: rtogs mdzad dam pa drang srong mi dbang lha yi
T02D2128:175a-10: dbang phyug ral pa gcig / kun rtog mi zad
T02D2128:175a-11: 'ching ba mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin dbang
T02D2128:175a-12: gis // gcod pa'i mtshon cha shes rab ral gri chags med chags bral autpal mtshan //
T02D2128:175a-13: bzlas brjod dka' thub sbyin sreg gtong sogs sgrub pa'i mtshan ma brgya phrag gis //
T02D2128:175a-14: mnyam par mi nus gang zhig lam min de nyid de lam gzhan min pa //
T02D2128:175a-15: shin tu zab mo gsang ba'i lam gyur yang dag sbas pa mngon rnyed pa //
T02D2128:175a-16: dpal gyi dpal dbang srid gsum thi bas po'i mun 'joms ral pa gcig 'chang khyod //
T02D2128:175a-17: phyag 'tshal dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po //
T02D2128:175a-18: sku gsung thugs dag srid 'joms pa //
T02D2128:175a-19: zhi bas mi bsnyel phrin las sgrub //
T02D2128:175a-20: lha yi lha mchog ral pa gcig / dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi //
T02D2128:175a-21: mkha' dbyings las byung lha mchog nyid //
T02D2128:175a-23: gzhan gyis mi thub ral pa thub pa gcig / sna tshogs pad nyid thod par ro //
T02D2128:175a-24: h'um dang gri gug las byung ba //
T02D2128:175a-25: ye shes sku mchog zhal gsum phyag / bzhi ldan bcom ldan khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2128:175a-26: gri gug ral gri thod pa dang //
T02D2128:175a-28: padmo yi ge rnam pa lngas //
T02D2128:175a-29: sa gsum sbyong mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2128:175a-30: mdag pa dang dag pa dag / dri med de ni ye shes dngos //
T02D2128:175a-31: thogs med rtag tu bsgyur nas ni //
T02D2128:175b-1: dran pa tsam gyis bdud 'dul zhing //
T02D2128:175b-2: dgra 'joms nyon mongs kun bsreg pa //
T02D2128:175b-3: bde chen snying rje stong pa nyid //
T02D2128:175b-4: ro myong mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2128:175b-5: bcom ldan dpa' mo khro mo'i sku //
T02D2128:175b-6: gzhon nu sgeg mo 'jigs ma yi //
T02D2128:175b-7: sku gsung thugs kyi dgyes rol gcig /
T02D2128:175b-9: gdul bya'i rigs ni ji bzhin du //
T02D2128:175b-10: khyed kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa yang //
T02D2128:175b-11: de bzhin nyid de phun sum tshogs //
T02D2128:175b-12: ral pa gcig mnga' khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2128:175b-13: bcom ldan 'das dpal ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa /
T02D2128:175b-14: kha che'i pandi ta chen po buddha shr'i bha dra dang /
